text: I have visited here and had an exceptional experience. The Chinese doctor provided quality medications that truly made a difference in my health. The staff at the counter were also outstanding, offering friendly and efficient customer service. I felt well taken care of throughout my visit. Highly recommended for anyone seeking effective Chinese medicine and excellent service!
Recept Lishan and Dr Sun were very kind and patient in explanation. Lishan even passed me warm water and gave some helpful tips after my session. Pleasant experience. Highly recommended.

Physician Sun is very precise and thorough in her diagnosis. Very impressed with what she has done to help with my issues. The receptionist is amazing as well, she can remember the things we spoke about since last week !

赵医师 is very patient and skilled in 小儿推拿. My infant son is having cough and phlegm but he got much better over 1 to 2 visits. Much better than visiting other PD clinic with no cure and medicine for infant, TCM provides the Tuina solution to ease the condition and provide comfort. Ma Kuang is also very efficient and fast in terms of appointment booking. Highly recommended.

Physician Sun was very patient and carefully provided her consultation and advice to our problem. Her attentiveness and thorough explanation were greatly appreciated. We are thankful for Physician Sun's expertise and professionalism in addressing our concerns.
